title: Sunny Day
overview: Sunny Day is a musical comedy animated series that features a hairstylist and a salon-owning entrepreneur named Sunny. With the help of her best friends, Blair, Rox and her adorable pup, Doodle, Sunny can solve any problem through determination, self-expression and a positive attitude. Above all, Sunny always uses her styling skills in creative ways to be a true leader and inspires individuality in every preschooler.
